Html: This would make it feasible to actually develop TI-Basic programs on Android, and plus, the touch nature of Android seems to help the feel of the emulator, making it more fun to run programs.

Exporting programs for android is currently in the works. Importing programs is already possible:
  1. Load the file on to the device
  2. swipe from the left edge of the screen to bring up the menu.
  3. Select 'Send file'
  4. Browse for the file
Let me know if you have any other issues or questions
BuckeyeDude

I already know that importing is possible. I just haven't had a ton of use for it yet, primarily because of the inability to export. And, no, I don't have any more questions at the moment.

--
Isiah Meadows
